overview: Erotic film director Carla Divine and her star, Giselle Lorngette head east to New York City to hunt for the perfect new stud for their next movie. Dozens of guys show up to audition, but things don't go so smoothly as Carla tries desperately to keep her wannabe studs on the set and off the casting couch!
tagline: A Hard Man is Hard to Find!
title: Stud Hunters
